# **Welcome!**

This website serves as a personal portfolio showcasing selected academic and professional projects in environmental science and data analysis. Through coursework and independent work, I’ve developed skills in R, GitHub, Quarto, and reproducible research practices.

Use the navigation menu to explore my background, browse featured projects, and access my resume. Whether you're here as a mentor, collaborator, or potential employer—thanks for visiting!
